Name: K-Pop & Rock Band Manager
About the game: K-Pop and Rock Band Manager is a management game where you are the manager of a new Band and your aim is to make your Band Famous and get 1000 popularity points, make one million dollars, and have several status symbols like a branded fashion item and/or an apartment. A new star is born! ANM Entertainment wants to release a new 4-member Band. You have to choose the trainees who you think are ready to make their debut to the public and make a new history. How you manage the band will determine their future.
